translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: I am...worried.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I am...worried.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: About what?{#Name="Zero"}
source: About what?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: About Mikhail.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: About Mikhail.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Don't be. He's fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't be. He's fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: But...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm telling you. He's fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm telling you. He's fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Very well.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Very well.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I'm sure Mikhail is safe. But we should rescue him nonetheless.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I'm sure Mikhail is safe. But we should rescue him nonetheless.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: That was quite the scene earlier, wasn't it!{#Name="Octa"}
source: That was quite the scene earlier, wasn't it!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: First, your dragon makes a meal out of Lady Three,{LF}then he's stolen away by another disciple? Madness!{#Name="Octa"}
source: First, your dragon makes a meal out of Lady Three,{LF}then he's stolen away by another disciple? Madness!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You ordered him to eat her, I presume?{#Name="Octa"}
source: You ordered him to eat her, I presume?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Nope, sure didn't.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nope, sure didn't.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, my... Such a cruel twist of fate!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh, my... Such a cruel twist of fate!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Lady Three suffered a cruel end. Perhaps you and I{LF}should "commemorate" her passing, mmmmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Three suffered a cruel end. Perhaps you and I{LF}should "commemorate" her passing, mmmmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: So you know that guy who stole your dumb dragon?{LF}That was Cent.{#Name="Dito"}
source: So you know that guy who stole your dumb dragon?{LF}That was Cent.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: He's the disciple here in the Land of Sands.{#Name="Dito"}
source: He's the disciple here in the Land of Sands.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Two's disciple, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Two's disciple, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yep. They seem young, beautiful, and madly in love.{LF}Makes me wanna hurl!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yep. They seem young, beautiful, and madly in love.{LF}Makes me wanna hurl!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: 竜を２人の子ども代わりに育てていたりしてな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 竜を２人の子ども代わりに育てていたりしてな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: なんですか、その昔話みたいなほっこり感！{#Name="ディト"}
source: なんですか、その昔話みたいなほっこり感！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: This Cent guy seems like a real charmer, doesn't he?{LF}Probably better to just kill him when you take out Two.{#Name="Dito"}
source: This Cent guy seems like a real charmer, doesn't he?{LF}Probably better to just kill him when you take out Two.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So what do you think those two are planning, anyway?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So what do you think those two are planning, anyway?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Planning? As if either of them were smart enough{LF}to have an actual plan.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Planning? As if either of them were smart enough{LF}to have an actual plan.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Really? I figured Cent took your dragon because Two ordered it.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Really? I figured Cent took your dragon because Two ordered it.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: She's gotta have some reason for doing that, right? {#Name="Dito"}
source: She's gotta have some reason for doing that, right? {#Name="Dito"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero defeated Three, but lost Mikhail to the disciple, Cent, in the process.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Zero defeated Three, but lost Mikhail to the disciple, Cent, in the process.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The group headed for Cent's home in the Land of Sands{LF}to try and rescue the dragon...{#Name="Accord"}
source: The group headed for Cent's home in the Land of Sands{LF}to try and rescue the dragon...{#Name="Accord"}
